greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Signed super-Catalan or little Schroeder numbers.
reference: I. P. Goulden and D. M. Jackson, Combinatorial Enumeration, Wiley, N.Y., 1983, Exercise 2.7.12.(b).
link: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..300
formula: G.f.: 1 - x/(Q(0) + x) where Q(k) = 1 + k*(1+x) + x + x*(k+1)*(k+2)/Q(k+1); (continued fraction). - _Sergei N. Gladkovskii_, Mar 14 2013
G.f. A(x) satisfies: A(x) = (1 - 2*x*A(x)^2) / (1 - x). - _Ilya Gutkovskiy_, Jun 30 2020
mathematica: CoefficientList[Series[(-1 + x + Sqrt[1 + 6 x + x^2]) /x / 4, {x, 0, 30}], x] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Aug 05 2013 *)
results.author: _Paul Barry_, Feb 13 2003
